blogPost.excerpt:
Merlin Tuttle Bat Conservation: https://www.merlintuttle.org/
Become a member: https://www.merlintuttle.org/become-a-member/


Merlin Tuttle’s Bat Conservation is the most recent contribution by Merlin Tuttle to the world of bats. He has over 60 years of experience as a  renowned bat expert, educator and wildlife photographer. Merlin founded MTBC to teach the world understanding and appreciation of the contributions bats make to human beings and the world we share. 

Through MTBC, Merlin provides an amazing bat photo gallery,  up-to-date resources (https://www.merlintuttle.org/resources/) and responses to grossly exaggerated disease speculation about bats. (https://www.merlintuttle.org/resources/exaggerated-disease-warnings/) 

MTBC is the only place to directly support Merlin’s work.

Photo gallery: http://bit.ly/mtbcphotogallery

The Khao Chong Pran, Thailand story: http://bit.ly/khaochongpranbats

Bats and Agave: http://bit.ly/ofagavesandbats

Win Friends Not Battles: http://bit.ly/winfriendsnotbattles

Bat Fears in Perspective: http://bit.ly/batfearsinperspective
blogPost.body:
Merlin Tuttle Bat Conservation: https://www.merlintuttle.org/
Become a member: https://www.merlintuttle.org/become-a-member/


Merlin Tuttle’s Bat Conservation is the most recent contribution by Merlin Tuttle to the world of bats. He has over 60 years of experience as a  renowned bat expert, educator and wildlife photographer. Merlin founded MTBC to teach the world understanding and appreciation of the contributions bats make to human beings and the world we share. 

Through MTBC, Merlin provides an amazing bat photo gallery,  up-to-date resources (https://www.merlintuttle.org/resources/) and responses to grossly exaggerated disease speculation about bats. (https://www.merlintuttle.org/resources/exaggerated-disease-warnings/) 

MTBC is the only place to directly support Merlin’s work.

Photo gallery: http://bit.ly/mtbcphotogallery

localize.title: 真实的事实。帮助蝙蝠！
localize.description:
Merlin Tuttle蝙蝠保护：https://www.merlintuttle.org/
成为会员：https://www.merlintuttle.org/become-a-member/


梅林-塔特尔的《蝙蝠保护》是梅林-塔特尔对蝙蝠世界的最新贡献。作为著名的蝙蝠专家、教育家和野生动物摄影师，他拥有超过60年的经验。Merlin创立MTBC的目的是让世界了解和欣赏蝙蝠对人类和我们共同生活的世界的贡献。

通过MTBC，Merlin提供了一个令人惊叹的蝙蝠图片库，最新的资源(https://www.merlintuttle.org/resources/)，并对有关蝙蝠的严重夸张的疾病猜测做出了回应。(https://www.merlintuttle.org/resources/exaggerated-disease-warnings/) 

MTBC是唯一能直接支持梅林工作的地方。

照片集：http://bit.ly/mtbcphotogallery

泰国Khao Chong Pran的故事：http://bit.ly/khaochongpranbats。

Bats and Agave: http://bit.ly/ofagavesandbats

赢友不赢战：http://bit.ly/winfriendsnotbattles

蝙蝠的恐惧透视：http://bit.ly/batfearsinperspective

localize.title: 真實的事實。幫助蝙蝠！
localize.description:
Merlin Tuttle蝙蝠保護：https://www.merlintuttle.org/
成爲會員：https://www.merlintuttle.org/become-a-member/


梅林-塔特爾的《蝙蝠保護》是梅林-塔特爾對蝙蝠世界的最新貢獻。作爲著名的蝙蝠專家、教育家和野生動物攝影師，他擁有超過60年的經驗。Merlin創立MTBC的目的是讓世界瞭解和欣賞蝙蝠對人類和我們共同生活的世界的貢獻。

通過MTBC，Merlin提供了一個令人驚歎的蝙蝠圖片庫，最新的資源(https://www.merlintuttle.org/resources/)，並對有關蝙蝠的嚴重誇張的疾病猜測做出了迴應。(https://www.merlintuttle.org/resources/exaggerated-disease-warnings/) 

MTBC是唯一能直接支持梅林工作的地方。

照片集：http://bit.ly/mtbcphotogallery

泰國Khao Chong Pran的故事：http://bit.ly/khaochongpranbats。

Bats and Agave: http://bit.ly/ofagavesandbats

贏友不贏戰：http://bit.ly/winfriendsnotbattles

蝙蝠的恐懼透視：http://bit.ly/batfearsinperspective
